Products.ProductDescription:
Badass Series : MRT QuadFlow H-Pipe #91S119
LOUD, AGGRESSIVE, TAKE NO PRISONERS!

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT QuadFlow H-Pipe #91S119 has a loud, aggressive muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 3" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    No tips.
  • What are my system finish options?
    T304 Stainless Steel : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    No tips.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2014, 2015, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019
    Corvette C7
  • What doesn't it fit?
  • Does it require a tune?
    MRT AFM/NPP Power Plate recommended.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductDescription:
Street Performance Series : MRT Version 2 Quad Tip-Cat-Back #92U843
BALANCED SOUND AND PERFORMANCE

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Version 2 Quad-Tip Cat-Back #92U843 has a aggressive, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    Quad 4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2016, 2017, 2018 & 2019 Camaro SS Coupe & Convertible. 2016 SS models need the quad-tip rear diffuser attachment for this application.
  • What doesn't it fit?
    Camaro V6 or I4 Engine Package.
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required. If your car is equipped with AFM valves our AFM-NPP Power Plate is needed in order to avoid tuning.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.
